title: Prenatal forest fire exposure stunts children's growth

title_detail.value: Prenatal forest fire exposure stunts children's growth

summary: Forest fires are more harmful than previously imagined, causing stunted growth in children who were exposed to smoke while in the womb, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Forest fires are more harmful than previously imagined, causing stunted growth in children who were exposed to smoke while in the womb, according to new research.
